title: FS: Lot of 10 Lower Grade T206 Commons - ALL SOLD
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: FS: Lot of 10 Lower Grade T206 Commons - ALL SOLD
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T206 cards for sale or trade.  As the scans will show, these are lower grade cards, but present well for the technical grade.

Please add $3 shipping for 1-2 cards. For 3 or more, I will cover shipping. Payment via any method you prefer. Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to purchase any cards or with any questions. Thanks for looking!

CARDS PICTURED (see below for scans):

**ALL CARDS SOLD**
I'll take Moriarty, Ritchey, Stanage, Phillippe.

Cards pictured:

**all cards sold. Thank you!!**

My kind of cards!  Too bad there's no Sovereigns in the lot.  Good to see some cards from Marc...always great to deal with!

Cheers,
Geno

I'll take Hayden. Email sent.

Sent from my SM-G960U using Tapatalk
